content: in the 90 s movie runaway bride you catch this little glimpse of this classic crochet chevron blanket i loved how that blanket used this variegated green yarn paired with a solid white yarn so in honor of that movie and my favorite actress julia roberts the julia throw blanket was born i hope you enjoy making this timeless crochet project as much as i did the julia throw blanket uses lion brand pound of love paired with lion brand bundle of love any other worsted weight yarn would also work - 2 balls of white pound of love or 1 530 yards/1 398 m 24 oz/681 g - 2 balls of enchanted forest bundle of love or 1 107 yards/1 012 m 17 7 oz/502 g or mix and match your own choices **more pattern details ** - you ll only need to know how to single_crochet to make this blanket it s very beginner friendly - size is completely adjustable with notes on how to make your blanket larger or smaller - written in us terms **pattern discount codes ** save10 - purchase 3+ patterns and get 10% off save15 - purchase 5+ patterns and get 15% off save20 - purchase 8+ patterns and get 20% off **you can find me in the following places ** www pinterest com/whiletheydream www instagram com/while they dream www facebook com/while they dream this is a pdf pattern only not a physical item pattern will be available for instant download via checkout screen & automatic email upon payment all sales are final with digital downloads available as kit from lion brand https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-kit-julia-throw-blanket
